title: Gaugllm: Improving graph contrastive learning for text-attributed graphs with large language models
details: Y Fang, D Fan, D Zha, Q Tan - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.11945, 2024
abstract: This work studies self-supervised graph learning for text-attributed graphs (TAGs) where nodes are represented by textual attributes. Unlike traditional graph contrastive methods that perturb the numerical feature space and alter the graph's …

title: Explainable Artificial Intelligence in Decoding Human Emotions Through Vision Transformers
details: M Marjanović - Sinteza 2024-International Scientific Conference on …, 2024
abstract: In artificial intelligence and psychological research, understanding how artificial intelligence interprets human emotions through facial expressions is challenging, thus emotion recognition became a crucial task in many computer vision …
